modules.name: Trim LFO Hz
modules.description:
Trims top/bottom values on the selected
LFO output, without attenuating

modules.name: Trim LFO BPM
modules.description:
Trims top/bottom values on the selected
LFO output, without attenuating

modules.name: Polyphonic Mixer
modules.description:
One Cable(s),
4x4 channel Mixer with send/return

modules.name: Clamp
modules.description:
Feed signal, gained output
won't go over voltages set.
Can also attenuvert signals,
Invert applied to input.

modules.name: Poly X
modules.description:
Merge to polyphonic with mute buttons.

When no input channels are connected
the mute buttons send 10v or 0v, for
use with Level/Pan inputs on Poly Mix.

modules.name: PulseCzar
modules.description: 8-bit wavetable oscillator based on C. Roads' Pulsar Synthesis model.

modules.name: PhaseCzar
modules.description: 8-bit wavetable oscillator based on Casio's Phase Distortion model.

modules.name: Logistiker
modules.description: Chaotic CV generator based on Logistics equation

modules.name: Radio Music
modules.description: Radio Music is a sampler pretending to be a radio

modules.name: Nosering
modules.description: Interpretation of Grant Richter's Noisering design

modules.name: Analogue Shift Register
modules.description: A dual 4, or single 8, step shift register.

modules.name: Burst Generator
modules.description: Generates bursts of 1-16 pulses whenever a trigger is received at the trigger input.

modules.name: Comparator
modules.description: Compares the input signal with either an internal or external threshold value and outputs gate signals based on the outcome.

modules.name: CV Spreader
modules.description: Accepts "Base" and "Spread" CV inputs and creates a set of new CV values that are spread either side of the base value by an amount determined by the spread value.

modules.name: Event Arranger
modules.description: A VCV Rack implementation of the VC Clock and Event Arranger published in an article by John Blacet in the Jan/Feb edition of Synapse magazine.

modules.name: Gate Delay
modules.description: A dual gate delay line giving up to 40 seconds of delay with voltage control over the delay time.

modules.name: Manual CV Generator
modules.description: A simple dual manual CV generator offering +/- 10V with both coarse and fine controls.

modules.name: Manual Gate
modules.description: A manually triggered gate generator offering a number of simultaneous gate and inverted gate outputs.

modules.name: Matrix Mixer
modules.description: A 4 x 4 matrix mixer allowing up to 4 input signals to be independently mixed to 4 different outputs.

modules.name: Minimus Maximus
modules.description: A signal processor that determines and outputs the minimum, maximum and mean (average) of up to 4 input signals.

modules.name: Mixer
modules.description: A basic 4 input utility mixer with output level control, overload indicator, inverted output and selectable bipolar/unipolar operation.

modules.name: Multiplexer
modules.description: A 1 input to 8 output and 8 input to 1 output multiplexer.

modules.name: Mute-iple
modules.description: A dual 4-way/ Single 8 way mutable multiple.

modules.name: Polyrhythmic Generator
modules.description: A set of 8 voltage controlled clock dividers that can be used to generate polyrhythms by clocking and/or dividing at different rates.

modules.name: Shepard Generator
modules.description: Generates a set of 8 ramp and sawtooth control signals appropriately phased for generation of Shepard tones.

modules.name: SR Flip Flop
modules.description: A logical Set/Reset flip flop with enable.

modules.name: Tapped Gate Delay
modules.description: A gate delay that offers up to 40 seconds of delay with tapped outputs at equal intervals along the delay line.

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Frequency Divider
modules.description: Frequency divider with a variable and voltage controlled division ratio from 1 to around 20.

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Switch
modules.description: Selects between 2 inputs or routes 1 input to one of 2 outputs based on the level of the signal at the CV input.

modules.name: Voltage Inverter
modules.description: A quad voltage inverter that inverts signals around zero.

modules.name: Dumbwaiter
modules.description: 8 step sequencer and switch. One could see it as a A-155 / A-154 / A-152 merged into one module

modules.name: SwissCheeseKnife
modules.description: Quad utility module with a twist

modules.name: Holonic Source
modules.description: Integrates with the Holon.ist iOS app and outputs CV control signals to VCV Rack

modules.name: Junctions
modules.description: A simple dual switch. Two inputs, one output

modules.name: Lazy Susan
modules.description: Quad Quantiser with user editable scales

modules.name: Bombe
modules.description: A semi-random shift-register chord generator and looper

modules.name: Fifths and Fourths
modules.description: An implementation of the Circle of Fifths

modules.name: Generative
modules.description: A toolkit of functions intended to support generative music creation

modules.name: Imp
modules.description: A single channel trigger-to-gate and clock divider module

modules.name: Imperfect MkII
modules.description: A multi-channel trigger-to-gate and clock divider module

modules.name: Ruckus
modules.description: A trigger sequencer based on summed clock-dividers

modules.name: CV Toggle
modules.description: A labelled toggle switch, outputs 0V or 10V

modules.name: SEQ Adapter
modules.description: Nord style reset for syncing simple sequencers

modules.name: Sync
modules.description: Simplified Nord style reset for syncing simple sequencers

modules.name: Audio Interface 16
modules.description: A reskin of the Audio16 Interface (only kept for backwards compat)

modules.name: BPM LFO 2
modules.description: Beat Synchronized LFO with CV Waveshape

modules.name: Lissajous LFO
modules.description: LFO based on interactions of 4 sine waves

modules.name: Phased Locked Loop
modules.description: PLL attempts to follow input signals freqency

modules.name: Portland Weather
modules.description: 16 tap rhytmic delay with per tap pitch shifting and filtering

modules.name: Quad Algorithmic Rhythm Generator
modules.description: 4 track Euclidean and Golumb Ruler Sequencer

modules.name: Quad Rhythm Expander
modules.description: Expander for QAR adds probabilty and swing

modules.name: Roulette LFO
modules.description: LFO Based on based on rolling curves

modules.name: Seriously Slow LFO
modules.description: LFO for modulating CV over *very* long time periods

modules.name: The One Ring Modulator
modules.description: Ring Modulator with CV controlable response

modules.name: CV-MAP
modules.description: Add CV automation to 32 parameters of any module

modules.name: µMAP
modules.description: Add CV automation to one parameter of any module

modules.name: CV-PAM
modules.description: Generate CV from any parameter change of any module

modules.name: Rotor Model A
modules.description: Rotates a signal across polyphonic channels

modules.name: BOLT
modules.description: Polyphonic logic operations with modulation and sample & hold

modules.name: Snare Drum N
modules.description: Snare Drum Kit based on Novation Drumstation

modules.name: MIDIdualCV
modules.description: MIDI to Duophonic CV (Lower - Upper notes)

modules.name: Blossom
modules.description: Generates a pair of complex, pulsing LFO signals

modules.name: Cubic
modules.description: Offsets, scales, squares, and cubes its input signal

modules.name: Func
modules.description: A knob with a selectable range to offset or scale its input signal

modules.name: Func 6
modules.description: A chain of knobs with selectable ranges to offset and scale input signals

modules.name: Gator
modules.description: Computes eight common logic functions for up to 16 inputs

modules.name: Hostage
modules.description: Generates a hold or sustain envelope stage

modules.name: Ranger
modules.description: A modulatable knob with an adjustable, modulatable range

modules.name: Swave
modules.description: A waveshaper with a unique sigmoid transfer function

modules.name: Tapers
modules.description: A pair of modulatable knobs with adjustable, modulatable tapers

modules.name: Xycloid
modules.description: Generates a pair of complex, pulsing LFO signals

modules.name: FourView
modules.description: Quad note number viewer with pass through

modules.name: HarMoNee
modules.description: Apply musical (major third, fifth, etc...) offsets to CV 1v/oct signals

modules.name: Glissinator
modules.description: Do a constant time gliss over a changing input signal

modules.name: QuantEyes
modules.description: Quantize your signals to notes on a 12 tone scale

modules.name: SampleDelay
modules.description: A tiny number of sample delay

modules.name: ChipNoise
modules.description: A recreation of the NES Noise Generator

modules.name: ChipWaves
modules.description: A recreation of the NES oscillators

modules.name: ChipYourWave
modules.description: An 8 bit oscillator where you draw the waveform

modules.name: KarplusStrongPoly
modules.description: An implementation of KS in a module

modules.name: Bitulator
modules.description: A sub-par distortion and bit cruncher

modules.name: 8vert
modules.description: Attenuverts 8 signals or creates constant voltages

modules.name: Unity
modules.description: Mixes or averages signals with unity gain

modules.name: Sequential Switch 1
modules.description: Routes an input to one of to 4 outputs

modules.name: Sequential Switch 2
modules.description: Routes one of to 4 inputs to an output

modules.name: Split
modules.description: Splits a polyphonic cable into multiple monophonic cables

modules.name: Merge
modules.description: Combines multiple monophonic cables into a polyphonic cable

modules.name: Sum
modules.description: Sums all channels in a polyphonic cable

modules.name: Viz
modules.description: Visualizes all channels of a polyphonic cable

modules.name: QuadVCA/Mixer
modules.description: VCA module x 4, plus mixer functionality

modules.name: Flow
modules.description: Cut the flow of signals with a switch or a cv signal input

modules.name: Signal Delay
modules.description: Delay the incomming CV signal by set milliseconds

modules.name: Zero CV 2 Trigger
modules.description: Zero Crossing CV to Trigger generator

modules.name: ReScale
modules.description: Utility module to convert from one voltage range to another

modules.name: Triggers MKI
modules.description: Manual CV signal trigger with latch and temporary triggers + adjustable output voltage

modules.name: Triggers MKII
modules.description: Manual CV signal temporary trigger with labeling integrated

modules.name: TriggersMKIII
modules.description: Manual CV signal temporary trigger with editable labeling integrated

modules.name: Delay Plus Fx
modules.description: Delay effect with MS digital display, wet signal send & return and bypass switch

modules.description: Stereo Delay effect with MS digital display, wet signal send & return and bypass switch

modules.description: Phaser FX with CV input for each parameter and bypass switch

modules.description: Reverb FX with CV input for each parameter and bypass switch

modules.description: Stereo Reverb FX with CV input for each parameter and bypass switch

modules.description: Tremolo Fx with CV input for each parameter and bypass switch

modules.description: Stereo Tremolo Fx with CV input for each parameter and bypass switch

modules.name: Gate Length
modules.description: Create a gate with CV controlled length

modules.name: Color Panel
modules.description: Control the color of the panel with CV

modules.name: Shift Pedal
modules.description: Generate gates on mod key presses

modules.name: Specific Value
modules.description: Set or view voltages with text widget

modules.name: Hovered Value
modules.description: Display and output the value of the currently hovered widget

modules.name: Inject Value
modules.description: Inject value into param under cursor

modules.name: Idle Switch
modules.description: If a signal goes idle, flip a switch

modules.name: ASR
modules.description: Analog shift register. Multi-stage sample and hold

modules.name: Analog to Digital
modules.description: Converts a continuous signal into eight gates representing bit values.

modules.name: Blank Panel
modules.description: A blank panel. Show your love for HetrickCV

modules.name: Comparator
modules.description: Determine whether a signal is above or below a threshold.

modules.name: Contrast
modules.description: A mild distortion that brightens up a signal.

modules.name: Crackle
modules.description: Vinyl-like noise generator ported from SuperCollider.

modules.name: Delta
modules.description: Determine which direction a signal is heading.

modules.name: Digital to Analog
modules.description: Converts eight gates to a smooth signal.

modules.name: Dust
modules.description: Random impulse and noise generator ported from SuperCollider

modules.name: Exponent
modules.description: Raise a signal to a power

modules.name: Flip Pan
modules.description: A bidirectional panner, crossfader, and VCA

modules.name: OR Logic (Gate Combiner)
modules.description: Combines multiple gates into one gate.

modules.name: Random Gates
modules.description: Generates up to eight random gates.

modules.name: Scanner
modules.description: 8-channel signal crossfader, mixer, scanner, and router.

modules.name: 2 To 4 Mix Matrix
modules.description: Takes two signals and generates four variations.

modules.description: detect incoming clock and output voltages for Fundamental LFO and Delay

modules.name: Constants
modules.description: Output constant voltages corresponding to common intervals

modules.name: FreeVerb
modules.description: VCV Rack implementation of the good old Freeverb

modules.description: 8 Flip Flops, pre-wired as binary counter

modules.description: 8 fold switch with CV controllable switching point
